title: XDefiant Weapon Tier List
description: This is a tier list of the weapons in XDefiant as of May 2024. The weapons are ranked from S Tier to C Tier, with S Tier being the best and C Tier being the worst. The tier list is based on my own opinion and experience, and the best weapon for you will depend on your playstyle and preferences.
heading: XDefiant Weapon Tier List
introText: This is a tier list of the weapons in XDefiant as of May 2024. The weapons are ranked from S Tier to C Tier, with S Tier being the best and C Tier being the worst. The tier list is based on my own opinion and experience, and the best weapon for you will depend on your playstyle and preferences.

data.itemDescription: The M4A1 is a versatile and reliable assault rifle that is well-suited for all ranges. It has low recoil, good damage output, and a large magazine size
The ACR 6.8 is another excellent assault rifle that is known for its high damage output and fast fire rate. However, it has more recoil than the M4A1
The MP7 is a powerful SMG that is perfect for close-quarters combat. It has a high rate of fire, low recoil, and a large magazine size
The RPK-74 is a LMG that is ideal for suppressing enemy fire. It has a high rate of fire, large magazine size, and good damage output
The 686 Magnum is a powerful revolver that can kill an enemy in one shot with a headshot. However, it has a slow rate of fire and a small magazine size
The Vector .45 ACP is an SMG that is known for its high rate of fire and low recoil. However, it has low damage output and a small magazine size
The AK-47 is a classic assault rifle that is known for its high damage output and reliability. However, it has high recoil and a small magazine size
The M16A4 is an assault rifle that is similar to the M4A1, but it has a higher rate of fire and lower damage output

The 93R is a pistol that can be used as a secondary weapon or as a primary weapon for aggressive players. It has a high rate of fire and good damage output, but it has high recoil and a small magazine size
The TAC-50 is a sniper rifle that is perfect for long-range engagements. It has a one-hit kill potential to the head and chest, but it has slow ADS time and a small magazine size
The SVD is a sniper rifle that is similar to the TAC-50, but it has lower damage output and a higher rate of fire
The P90 is an SMG that is known for its high rate of fire and large magazine size. However, it has low damage output and high recoil
The M60 is a LMG that is ideal for laying down suppressing fire. It has a very high rate of fire and a large magazine size, but it has very high recoil and low accuracy
The PP-19 Bizon is an SMG that is known for its large magazine size. However, it has low damage output, high recoil, and low accuracy
The SPAS-12 is a shotgun that is perfect for close-quarters combat. However, it has a slow rate of fire, small magazine size, and long reload time
The XM1014 is a shotgun that is similar to the SPAS-12, but it has lower damage output and a higher rate of fire

The Desert Eagle is a pistol that can be used as a secondary weapon or as a primary weapon for aggressive players. It has high damage output, but it has extremely high recoil and a small magazine size
